text: Michael-Leon Wooley (born March 29, 1971) is an American actor and singer known for voicing Louis the Alligator from the 2009 Disney animated movie The Princess and the Frog and Darkseid from Injustice 2. == Filmography == * Grand Theft Auto IV (2008) * The Princess and the Frog (2009) * Grand Theft Auto V (2013) * Hotel Transylvania 2 (2015) * Injustice 2 (2017) * Hotel Transylvania 3: Summer Vacation (2018) == Other websites == * Category:1971 births Category:African-American singers Category:African-American stage actors Category:African-American voice actors Category:African-American movie actors Category:American video game actors Category:Actors from Virginia Category:Singers from Virginia Category:Living people
title: Michael-Leon Wooley
